name: Monophobia (itch) (Z-xian)
description:
A story where a girl is the only living thing left on earth

whatever in the fuck will she do about it??? 
oh noooooooooooo!!!!

(so far the game is a demo, really short maybe 2 -5 minutes, just to show the vibe of the game so yeah hope you like the tone of the game i set out)

(the demo ends when you enter the room, you can walk around but interact with nothing)
